title: Did Trump ever write "never admit defeat" in "the art of the bargain"?
subtitle: While President Trump may never admit defeat, he didn't write that in "the art of the bargain."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A passage from chapter 45 of US President Donald Trump's book "The Art of Agreement" says, "Never admit defeat." I won. If you don't win the claim that they cheated. They played her. They stole it."
